<script type="text/javascript">
      gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(function() {
	    var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
        var params = {
          "lg": prefs.getArray("lg"),
          "brand": "Buy it locally!",
          "countryCode": "CA",
          "font-family": "arial,helvetica,sans-serif",
          "font-family-brand": "arial,helvetica,sans-serif",
          "font-family-title": "arial,helvetica,sans-serif",
          "font-size": "12px",
          "font-size-brand": "18px",
          "font-size-title": "14px",
          "color": "#252525",
          "color-odd-row": "white",
          "color-brand": "#252525",
          "color-title": "#252525",
          "color-link": "#005e9d",
          "background-color": "#fff000",
          "background-color-odd-row": "#7f8082"
        };
        document.getElementById("wrapped").src = "http://anothersocialeconomy.appspot.com/widget/ase.jsp?" + gadgets.io.encodeValues(params);
	  });
    </script>
    <style>
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        overflow: hidden;
      }
    </style>
    <iframe id="wrapped" width="100%" height="100%" style="border: none; margin: 0; overflow: hidden; padding: 0;" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" ></iframe>
